thornhoof/laboratory/rathian.about-waiting/convinced: I guess you're right. Come back safely.
thornhoof/laboratory/rathian.about-waiting/entry: I'm not sure I should. I'd rather stick with you until we find what we're looking for.
thornhoof/laboratory/rathian.about-waiting/unconvinced: Well, I can take care of myself just fine. Carry on.

bubbles.hacked-generator-terminal: I got us admin privileges on that terminal.
bubbles.lets-hack-turret: I'm gonna take over the turret !

thornhoof/laboratory/rathian.convince-waiting: The path up ahead is dangerous. I must get you there in one piece, else this will all have been for nothing.
thornhoof/laboratory/rathian.first-time: The Ministry of Arcane Science laboratory. We should look for the control room. It's probably further underground. It might not be a bad idea to turn the power on too.
thornhoof/laboratory/rathian.unconvincing-waiting: I'm not trying to screw you Rathian, I'm just trying to avoid you dying a stupid death !
